attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The TV License is now a joke. The BBC have suffered from dwindling ratings for a long time now and the British public are sick of fat cat handouts and other wastes of License Payers money. Jail sentences are handed out to non-payers yet rapists can walk the streets. End this out-dated fee now.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
